title: Professional Dog Stroking
content: I will stroke your dog, all day every day. I have acquired much skill in the area of stroking dogs. A lot of this skill is due to the fact that I also spend a lot of my time stroking my chin when I am trying to think of a good new story to write. Get in touch if you would like me to stroke your dog

title: Window Cleaning
content: On the side I aso do a grand job cleaning windows. My secret window cleaner recipe is an old scouse secret passed down from the old days of yore. Challenge me to make your window cleaner than you have ever seen. You will most like severely hurt yourself by accidentally walking into a glass door you thought was open
